title: Nidecker Hylite H-Lock Focus Snowboard Boots 2020
description: Here's a good-looking, durable boot that fits well and performs even better. The Nidecker Hylite H-Lock Focus Snowboard Boots feature Heel-Lock Focus and Boa® lacing for customized hold and fit. Comfort is king in these boots thanks to the Gold-Level Heat-Moldable liner and 3D-Molded Triple Density footbed. Lace up, lock in, and look how far you've come in the Nidecker Hylite H-Lock Focus Snowboard Boots.

title: thirtytwo Zephyr Premium Spring Break Snowboard Boots 2021
description: Surf's up! It's spring break and you know what that means — five weekdays in a row surfing soft spring corn wearing the thirtytwo Zephyr Premium Spring Break Snowboard Boots. The right mix of style and tech makes these boots perfect for casual but killer snowboarding. Slush it up with your buds or straight-line to oblivion, Recoil Flex Control lets you up or down the stiffness based on your mood. Upgraded with a performance rubber outsole and padded with energy foam, the thirtytwo Zephyr Premium Spring Break Snowboard Boots boots give you the kind of comfort that you feel on the first Friday of spring break.

title: K2 Darko Snowboard Boots 2023
description: When you're mostly riding the park, you don't need the mega-stiff flex found in most of the freeride boots on the market. The plus side of that is that awesome freestyle boots like the K2 Darko Snowboard Boots just happen to be crazy comfortable as well. This smooth flexing freestyler has a traditional lacing system with a Boa-secured Intuition liner. It keeps it simple so you can keep it stylish, feeling good and ripping park laps all day long.

title: Ride Triad Snowboard Boots 2023
description: When it comes to your gear, simplicity matters. And it doesn't get any simpler than laces. The Ride Triad Snowboard Boots have been a rider favorite for years, and it's easy to see why. They continue to rank with the best thanks to features like grippy Flex Lite 2.0 Soles and impact absorbing +SLIME Midsoles, not to mention Ride's excellent In2grated™ Construction amd 1:1 Lasting. If you're in the market for a capable, straightforward boot that gets the job done no questions asked, try the Ride Triad Snowboard Boots on for size.

title: thirtytwo Bandito x Christenson Snowboard Boots 2022
description: Loose, relaxed, and in a word, "surfy," the thirtytwo Bandito x Christenson Snowboard Boots take design inspiration from Chris Christenson and are appropriately named after his 9'4" Bandito mega-gun. When the rhythm of the ocean is your template and you want that feeing on snow, the new Bandito boots have your name on them. A fresh surf-style internal harness and liner put the emphasis on max articulation with great heel hold, providing a unique riding feel. The roots revival theme carries on with the rustic full leather uppers and trad lacing system, so feel free to let your hair down and embrace the flow.

title: Rome Bodega Boa Snowboard Boots 2022
description: The Rome Bodega Boa Snowboard Boots are a freestyle behemoth with a softer flex and functional simplicity. A Focus Double Boa system keeps your feet locked in place while a Gripflex rubber outsole and and fully heat moldable liner mean you can stay upright and comfy all day long.

title: DC Shuksan Boa Snowboard Boots 2020
description: With a name like Shuksan, it has to be good (and they are). DC Shuksan Boa Snowboard Boots take their name from the location of the Mt. Baker Ski Area, the spiritual home of Snowboarding with a capital S. They're built very stiff, to handle the type of riding you'll encounter at Baker, like blasting out of a chute into a chunder field. They're light and solid, for hiking to the goods. They look dope, because why not. These boots aren't messing around, because they're for snowboarding--the most important thing in the galaxy.

title: thirtytwo Light Snowboard Boots 2023
description: The thirtytwo Light JP Snowboard Boots are the footwear of choice for team rider JP Walker, with ample support and less weight for better maneuverability and more air. A great choice for rails, ramps and powder riding where hiking is involved, the light features a medium "4" flex and classic lace system.

title: thirtytwo Light JP Snowboard Boots 2023
description: The thirtytwo Light JP Snowboard Boots are the footwear of choice for team rider JP Walker, with ample support and less weight for better maneuverability and more air. A great choice for rails, ramps and powder riding where hiking is involved, the light features a medium "4" flex and classic lace system.

title: K2 Raider Snowboard Boots 2021
description: These boots are all about ease of use and durability. The Intuition Comfort liner are (you guessed it) mad comfy right out of the box, and the full rubber outsoles are grippy and long lasting. These boots slip on easily with a fast-in liner lacing system and crank down tight for optimum performance. For a first snowboard boot, or just a mellow-flexing all day comfortable resort rider, you can't go wrong with the K2 Raider Snowboard Boots.

title: Salomon Dialogue Dual Boa Wide Snowboard Boots 2022 - Used
description: Get it all, and more, with the Salomon Dialogue Dual Boa Wide Snowboard Boots. A full custom fit heat moldable liner, dual Boa® closures for "just right" fit in a snap (or a twist, as the case may be), and a wider last provide the dialed comfort and performance those with higher volume feet have been waiting for.

title: Burton Ruler Snowboard Boots 2022
description: Conquer the mountain with the Burton Ruler Snowboard Boots. A medium flex that finds the balance of progressive riding and forgiving feel for all day comfort and all-mountain versatility. Customizable fit with heat moldable liners and unmatched out-of-the-box comfort, will make sure that riding all day is a breeze. Say goodbye to the days of spending time lacing boots and painful pressure points with the Burton Ruler Snowboard Boots.

title: thirtytwo STW Double Boa Snowboard Boots 2022
description: An "easy-to-love" and "forgiving when you mess up" boot with twice the convenience thanks to its dual Boa controls, the STW Double Boa Snowboard Boots connect you to your bindings with maximum comfort and minimum drama. With true 1:1 lasting and dependable heel hold, these boots make it easy to find your feet some good partners.

title: Vans Aura Pro Snowboard Boots 2022
description: The Vans Aura Pro Snowboard Boots is a solid all around option for riders who like the locked-in feel of a two reel Boa system but prefer a mid flexing boot for more versatility. They feature a Smartwool-lined inner for warmth, comfort, and moisture-wicking prowess, plus an all-new V2 Waffle Pro Outsole for outstanding boardfeel and grippy scramblability.

title: K2 Boundary Snowboard Boots 2022
description: The K2 Boundary Snowboard Boots roam the zone between freeride and freestyle, giving you one boot that delivers the best of both worlds. They come with a park friendly flex, but can rail hard when pushed - ideal for riders looking to bring their favorite party tricks to the rest of the mountain. Dual H4/M3 Zonal Boa® dials let you control the fit to a T and the Intuition® Control Foam 3D liner with 3-Point Harness locks you in like no other. Live on the Boundary and rejoice.

title: thirtytwo Lashed Bradshaw Snowboard Boots 2022
description: The thirtytwo Lashed Snowboard Boots slay park and pow alike - and have for years. This proven classic is still the one to beat when you're shopping for an all-rounder to ride any type of conditions, and the traditional lace version is still the choice of many experienced riders. The thirtytwo Lashed Bradshaw Snowboard Boots feature a special black-grey-orange colorway that's super sick, and primed for Halloween.

title: Ride Deadbolt Snowboard Boots 2020
description: Lock the doors, because the Ride Deadbolt Snowboard Boots are so hot your friends might be clamoring like mad animals to take them out for a spin. Hard-charging freestyle riders and all-mountain black-diamond maulers, these are the boots for you. Adjustable Power Straps let you customize the amount of response and adjust your fit quickly. With the Ride Deadbolt Snowboard Boots you get superb edge-to-edge control, heat-moldable wrap liners, grippy Michelin Fiberlite Outsoles, and boots with some of the sickest looks around.

title: DC Travis Rice Boa Snowboard Boots 2020
description: These are the boots T.Rice wears. Boom. Done. DC Travis Rice Boa Snowboard Boots have been designed to stay comfortable in the least comfortable conditions, be light when the going gets heavy, and pretty much just live up to the demands of the planet's most demanding snowboarder. Again: these are the boots T.Rice wears. Go forth and do something irrational!

title: Nitro Club Boa Snowboard Boots 2021
description: There's no annual fee, no membership card, and no secret handshake needed to join this club. The Nitro Club Boa Snowboard Boots deliver bomber all mountain performance to all comers with a dialed blend of flexibility, response, precision, and play. Just as happy nuking down big lines as they are carving, buttering, and sending it off kickers large and small, these versatile boots feature heat moldable Cloud 5 Liners and Dual Boa® Lacing to keep the fit tweaked to perfection without having to waste time unlacing. See you in the Club.

title: Salomon Faction Boa Snowboard Boots 2023
description: If you're trying to get the hang of snowboarding, you need boots that are as comfy as your favorite sneakers. The Salomon Faction Boa® Snowboard Boots bring everyday comfort to newer riders, thanks to their sneaker-inspired design and shock-absorbing D-Light outsole. The soft flex is ideal for progression and the custom fit liner is optimized to mold to your feet in the most common problem zones for dialed-in perfection.

title: thirtytwo Shifty Boa Snowboard Boots 2023
description: Surf and tweak to your hearts content in the thirtytwo Shifty Boa Snowboard Boots - they're thirtytwo's softest adult option and ready to rip with a convenient single Boa closure and tons of lightweight, streamlined style.

title: Burton Ruler Wide Snowboard Boots 2021
description: Put an end to pain and conquer the mountain with the extra forefoot room of the Burton Ruler Wide Snowboard Boots. A medium flex that finds the balance of progressive riding and forgiving feel for all day comfort and all-mountain versatility. Customizable fit with heat moldable liners and unmatched out-of-the-box comfort, will make sure that riding all day is a breeze. With true 1:1 lasting and dependable heel hold, these boots make it easy to find your feet some good partners.

title: DC Judge Boa Snowboard Boots 2021
description: All rise for the honorable DC Judge Boa Snowboard Boots. The Judge means business, but looks cool as a cucumber. And that's not all. These boots deliver custom comfort and secure heel-hold thanks to the dual zone Boa closure system. Plus, they're tough as nails thanks to the stiff flex and rugged Vibram outsoles. If you want to control your own destiny on the slopes, get in the DC Judge Snowboard Boots.

title: Ride Lasso Pro Wide Snowboard Boots 2021 - Used
description: The Ride Lasso Pro Wide Snowboard Boots are a beefed up version of Ride's popular Lasso boot, in a wider last. They feature a Boa Coiler system and and Intuition wrap liner for even distribution of pressure and a firm yet consistent flex. This responsive, comfortable boot shines everywhere from the steeps to the half pipe.

title: Ride 92 Snowboard Boots 2020
description: The Ride 92 Snowboard Boots are all that and a metaphorical bag of chips. Fitted with a two-zone BOA closure system and a wrap liner for luxurious levels of support from an all-terrain freestyle boot, you can enjoy maximum comfort with an easy entry and exit for convenience that puts vending machines to shame. Ride's Flex Slime Tongue gives ample rebound to cushion you through your tricks, carves, and trenches laid, while internal and external J bars help keep your foot properly seated for quick power transfer and dialed-in response.

title: Vans Aura OG Snowboard Boots 2022
description: Simple, lightweight, and effective. The Vans Aura OG Snowboard Boots provide the durability and performance you need out of an all-mountain boot, but with a pared-down design that doesn't distract itself with all of the bells and whistles. The single Boa system will have you dialed in for a good time, and a forgiving flex and super comfortable liner will help you get the most out of any style of riding.

title: Salomon Launch Lace SJ Boa Snowboard Boots 2022
description: The Salomon Launch Lace Boa SJ Snowboard Boots are a light, nimble feeling freestyle boot employing Salomon's exclusive STR8JKT support system for the liner and a combination of Boa® closure plus traditional laces for the outer. This clever arrangement keeps the heel fit super snug but lessens the chance of a catastrophic cable break from the edges of your (or someone else's) board. These boots are a favorite of Salomon's team riders, and for good reason.

title: Nitro Club Boa Snowboard Boots 2021 - Used
description: There's no annual fee, no membership card, and no secret handshake needed to join this club. Just as happy nuking down big lines as they are carving, buttering, and sending it off kickers large and small, these versatile boots feature heat moldable Cloud 5 Liners and Dual Boa® Lacing to keep the fit tweaked to perfection without having to waste time unlacing. See you in the Club.

Finally, the boot sole features tons of shock absorbent EVA to take a bit of the harshness out of overshot landings and chopped up run ins.

title: thirtytwo STW Double Boa Snowboard Boots 2021
description: Full customization meets ultimate comfort in the thirtytwo STW Double Boa Snowboard Boots. The dual zone precision fit keeps you locked into the comfort liner, footbed, and harness, giving your feet cold-weather serenity inside your boots while you experience the ever-changing mountain terrain. Find who you are as a snowboarder in the thirtytwo STW Double Boa Snowboard Boots. You'll get more out of a season pass if you have gear that supports your urge to ride from first chair to last.

title: Burton Moto Boa Snowboard Boots 2021
description: The Burton Moto Boa Snowboard Boots have been in the Burton lineup for 17 years. With over a decade under its belt, the careful refinement of these legendary boots have made them a must for any novice to experienced shredder who needs the best soft flex boot on the mountain. Stay warm and dry while you carve some surfy lines without any toe drag thanks to the Shrinkage™ footprint reduction technology. Ultimate comfort and an easy-to-use Boa® Coiler™ lacing system make the Burton Moto Boa Snowboard Boots a must for creative riding and park tweaks.

title: Salomon Launch Boa SJ Snowboard Boots 2022
description: The Salomon Launch Boa SJ Snowboard Boots are favorites among park and pipe aficionados the world over, and not without reason. Salomon's STR8JKT system really does grab your heel and midfoot and produce a remarkable fit, the light weight and clean design work well in a freestyle environment, and the heat-moldable liner is super comfy. Do what you want after you strap in, but ignore the Launch Boa SJ at your peril.

title: Salomon Dialogue Focus Boa Snowboard Boots 2019
description: Catering to the freestyle fanatic, the Salomon Dialogue Focus Boa Snowboard Boots blends the speed and convenience of Boa with the full flexing performance of the ever popular Dialogue chassis. To ensure a premium fit, Salomon's equipped these boots with heat moldable Gold Liners and Heel Cage tech to virtually eliminate any potential heel-lift. Dial in precision and performance in the park this year with the Salomon Dialogue Focus Boa Snowboard Boots.

title: K2 Lewiston Snowboard Boots 2022
description: The K2 Lewiston Snowboard Boots hit the mark for both versatility and comfort - the kind of boots that you can just put on and ride without a second thought. They're very lightweight with a super clean, straightforward design, and they pack just right amount of tech without going overboard.

title: Burton Ruler Wide Snowboard Boots 2021 - Used
description: Put an end to pain and conquer the mountain with the extra forefoot room of the Burton Ruler Wide Snowboard Boots. A medium flex that finds the balance of progressive riding and forgiving feel for all day comfort and all-mountain versatility. Customizable fit with heat moldable liners and unmatched out-of-the-box comfort, will make sure that riding all day is a breeze. Say goodbye to the days of spending time manually lacing boots and painful pressure points with the Burton Ruler Wide Snowboard Boots.

title: Vans Hi-Standard Pro Snowboard Boots 2022
description: Simple, low-key Van's style in a lace up design that never fails to perform, the Vans Hi-Standard Pro Snowboard Boots are a classic that won't go away. The V2 Ultracush with Smartwool liner uses Merino wool to actively keep your feet dry all day, which translates to better riding and more warmth. An old-school design that ranks among the best.

title: thirtytwo Lashed Snowboard Boots 2022
description: The thirtytwo Lashed Snowboard Boots slay park and pow alike - and have for years. This proven classic is still the one to beat when you're shopping for an all-rounder to ride any type of conditions. The traditional lace version is still the choice of many experienced riders. Get in the Lashed and see what all the fuss is and has been about.

title: Vans Standard XF Snow MTE Pow Surfing Boots 2022
description: When there's a meter of fresh in his driveway, Wolle Nyvelt pulls on the Vans Standard XF Snow MTE Snowboard Boots. When he can finally get his car out, he's ready to go powsurfing - the MTE grippy sole with its inverted waffle pattern is ready to do its thing, the velcro powerstrap gets the tension just right, and the snowboard-inspired V2 Popcush footbed is oh-so comfy when riding a bindingless setup in pow. If powsurfing is your thing, you won't want anything else.

title: Ride Rook Snowboard Boots 2023
description: If you're gonna hit the big leagues, you're gonna need quality gear. The Ride Rook Snowboard Boots rescue you from the morning rental scrum to get you out on the snowsooner. They offer a mid-flexing design with a comfortable Intuition® Plush Foam liner and easy-to-adjust Boa® H4 closure system. A fantastic, progression-friendly choice for riders with big ambitions.

title: thirtytwo STW Boa Snowboard Boots 2022
description: Great comfort straight out of the box, a softer flex ideal for new riders or park progression, and the convenience of a single Boa closure are just a few of the details that make the thirtytwo STW Boa Snowboard Boots a great choice for both beginning and experienced riders. When it's time to get up off the couch and make some turns, the thirtytwo STW Boa Snowboard Boots are ready and waiting.

title: Vans Invado OG Snowboard Boots 2023
description: The Vans Invado OG Snowboard Boots have those classic Off the Wall looks you know and love, along with fat stacks of modern freestyle performance. The Hybrid Boa system provide bomber heel hold to keep you locked in the driver's seat no matter what, and the flex is a perfect balance of forgiving and responsive for optimal park and all-mountain stylin'.

title: Burton Ruler Snowboard Boots 2022 - Used
description: Conquer the mountain with the Burton Ruler Snowboard Boots. A medium flex that finds the balance of progressive riding and forgiving feel for all day comfort and all-mountain versatility. Customizable fit with heat moldable liners and unmatched out-of-the-box comfort, will make sure that riding all day is a breeze. Say goodbye to the days of spending time lacing boots and painful pressure points with the Burton Ruler Snowboard Boots.

title: Nidecker Helios Focus Boa Snowboard Boots 2020
description: The Nidecker Helios Focus Boa Snowboard Boots are responsive snowboarding kicks that are smooth on the outside, cushioned on the inside, and ride like a bat out of hell. Silver Level Heat Moldable liners offer stellar board feel with premium comfort and an ergonomic fit and keep your heel flush for control thanks to the integrated internal harness. The B.F.T. Vibram® Ascent outsoles on the Nidecker Helios Focus Boa Snowboard Boots handle icy conditions in stride, and the Silvadur™ Antimicrobial lined interior helps you avoid killing everyone's appetite for lunch when you let your tired dogs loose in the lodge.

title: Nidecker Triton Snowboard Boots 2022
description: Having trouble balancing the budget while you set up your rocking new winter setup? Well, the Nidecker Triton Snowboard Boots are here to help. The Triton is a teched up mid-soft boot that offers performance-forward quality and innovative features that frankly, could cost a whole bunch more! The Dual Zone Boa features fabric-wrapped laces and the H4 Coiler™, allowing users to adjust the lower and upper boot independently. The Triton has 5 degrees of forward lean, so rider's won't feel the need to constantly use their edges, making it perfect for intermediate shredders who want less edge bite during the progression.

title: thirtytwo Lashed Crab Grab Snowboard Boots 2022
description: Now we're talking - thirtytwo's most versatile boot in a Crab Grab black, white and red colorway? The thirtytwo Lashed Crab Grab Snowboard Boots might not fulfill your EVERY fantasy, but that's one big one out of the way.

title: thirtytwo TM-Two Double Boa Wide Snowboard Boots 2022 - Used
description: And you thought the regular thirtytwo boots were wide and comfy? It wasn't enough for Bode Merrill, and he asked for an even wider build on his pro model. The result is the thirtytwo TM-Two Double Boa Wide Snowboard Boots, which add another 18mm of width in the forefoot for true Sasquatch foot relief. This is a stout boot with a "7" flex and dual Boa® Fit System closures. It deserves a close look if your feet are seriously wide.

title: Ride Anthem Snowboard Boots 2021
description: Oh yeah, these boots are comfy as heck. Park your lamborfeeties in these luxury garages and you're in for a good time. The Ride Anthem Snowboard Boots come with a shmedium flex and extra plush liners that ensure all-day comfort. A favorite of up and coming riders, snowboard instructors, and dedicated après enthusiasts. These boots handle well on the slopes, and never give you a hard time.

title: Ride Jackson Snowboard Boots 2021
description: The Ride Jackson Snowboard Boots are some of the highest quality mid-flexing boots on the market. Fitted with my of the features found on Ride's top-of-the-line freeride boots, like an H4 Boa system and Intuition liners, these boots are ready to rock it right out of the box.

title: Salomon Dialogue Snowboard Boots 2019
description: Step into the Salomon Dialogue Snowboard Boots and you'll find the confidence-inspiring foot lockers you've been looking for, from the terrain park to the backcountry booter and beyond. Superior comfort from the Ortholite C2 insole pairs with a Flight + outsole to soak up the shock of hard landings. A progressive, medium flex makes tweaks easy while still providing you with enough support for all day happy feet.

title: DC The Laced Boot Snowboard Boots 2021
description: The skate-inspired DC Laced Snowboard Boots strike a beautiful balance between support and flexibility. The premium traditional lacing is super convenient but also infinitely adjustable. They look and feel like a pair of skate shoes. The kind that gives you that new-kicks, extra-pep-in-your-step kind of feeling that you get when you're walking down the hall to the last school period of the day. You won't just feel good wearing these, you'll perform better. DC says the Laced Snowboard Boots are the most responsive laced setup they've ever built, and we agree.

title: Vans Hi-Standard Pro Snowboard Boots 2022 - Used
description: Simple, low-key Van's style in a lace up design that never fails to perform, the Vans Hi-Standard Pro Snowboard Boots are a classic that won't go away. The V2 Ultracush with Smartwool liner uses Merino wool to actively keep your feet dry all day, which translates to better riding and more warmth. An old-school design that ranks among the best.

title: Burton Ruler Boa Snowboard Boots 2021 - Used
description: Conquer the mountain with the Burton Ruler Boa Snowboard Boots. A medium flex that finds the balance of progressive riding and forgiving feel for all day comfort and all-mountain versatility. Customizable fit with heat moldable liners and unmatched out-of-the-box comfort, will make sure that riding all day is a breeze. Say goodbye to the days of spending time lacing boots and painful pressure points with the Burton Ruler Boa Snowboard Boots.

title: K2 Darko Snowboard Boots 2022
description: A freestyle staple since the day, the K2 Darko Snowboard Boots combine a traditional lace-up exterior with a Boa® laced Intuition® Control Foam inner liner to create a boot that fits park riders' need perfectly. A medium-flexing classic that's still ruling from the bottoms of your feet.

title: Rome Bodega Hybrid Boa Snowboard Boots 2022
description: For riders who want a softer boot that doesn't compromise on performance, the Rome Bodega Hybrid Boa Snowboard Boots are for you. A Pro F.I.T. Liner is fully heat-moldable for maximum comfort and performance, while a Hybrid Heel Lock Boa and lace system makes strapping in and staying locked a breeze. Embrace your freestyle side with the Rome Bodega Hybrid Boa Snowboard Boots.

title: Burton Moto Boa Snowboard Boots 2021 - Used
description: The Burton Moto Boa Snowboard Boots have been in the Burton lineup for 17 years. With over a decade under its belt, the careful refinement of these legendary boots have made them a must for any novice to experienced shredder who needs the best soft flex boot on the mountain. Stay warm and dry while you carve some surfy lines without any toe drag thanks to the Shrinkage™ footprint reduction technology. Ultimate comfort and an easy-to-use Boa® Coiler™ lacing system make the Burton Moto Boa Snowboard Boots a must for creative riding and park tweaks.

title: DC Control Boa Snowboard Boots 2020
description: DC Control Boa Snowboard Boots give you dominion over your foot-to-board interface. From their ultra-grippy soles to the pinpoint adjustability of their dual zone Boa closure system, you're always in charge. These boots are made with the rider who does it all in mind: if there's snow, you're on it. These are lightweight, durable, and a proven favorite.

title: K2 Maysis Snowboard Boots 2020
description: Powerful riders need powerful boots for powerful riding, and the K2 Maysis Snowboard Boots are the power-to-the-floor big line and steeps boots for the trench laying shredder. Internal and external J bars pack excellent heel hold to keep responsiveness high for reliable control, with 3D formed EVA foam in the footbeds to help your feet hold up better during all out descents, inspired moments in the park, and anywhere your sideways ripping takes you. Boa® lacing systems make it easy to dial in a custom and secure fit with easy exit for convenience on the mountain. The K2 Maysis Snowboard Boots are performance boots for the all-terrain snow traveler with a confident style.

title: DC Judge Boa Snowboard Boots 2020
description: Here comes the Judge! The DC Judge Boa Snowboard Boots slams the gavel down hard on stiff, high-performance boots: case closed. These babies have everything you're looking for: dual Boa dials, tons of support, and a perfect Vibram sole. Throw these on and you're instantly equipped to deliver justice to the mountains.

title: Vans Hi Standard OG Snowboard Boots 2023
description: The standard-bearer for classic style and modern performance, the Vans Hi-Standard OG Snowboard Boots continues to be one of the best-selling boots on the market. Keeping the comfort and familiarity of your favorite Vans, the Hi-Standard OG offers a traditional lace-up closure and key features like an Instep Lace Lockout and Internal Web Harness. With a V1 Waffle Lug Outsoles and an iconic Vans side stripe, the timelessness of the OG speaks for itself.

title: thirtytwo Shifty Snowboard Boots 2023
description: Surf and tweak to your hearts content in the thirtytwo Shifty Boa Snowboard Boots - they're thirtytwo's softest adult option and ready to rip with a convenient single Boa closure and tons of lightweight, streamlined style.
